pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for working with Hansen et al. 2013 Global Forest Change dataset // The gfcanalysis package supports analyses using the Global Forest Change dataset released by Hansen et al. 2013. gfcanalysis was written by the Tropical Ecology Assessment and Monitoring (TEAM) Network (http://www.teamnetwork.org). For additional details on the Global Forest Change dataset, see: Hansen, M. et al. 2013. "High-Resolution Global Maps of 21st- Century Forest Cover Change." Science 342 (15 November): 850-53. Data available on-line from: http://earthenginepartners.appspot.com/science-2013-global- forest
